title: Aeron Office Chair
medium:
Structure: Glass-reinforced polyester and die-cast aluminum 
Pellicle: Hytrel polymer, polyester, and Lycra
dimensions: Dimensions range from a minimum h. of 37 1/4" (94.6 cm) to a max h. of 43" (109.2 cm) x 28 1/2 x 28 1/2" (72.4 x 72.4 cm)
credits: Gift of the employees of Herman Miller
